name: Smoots World Cup Tennis
description: Smoots World Cup Tennis is an Arcade Tennis game with plenty of possibilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows®7 / Windows®8 / Windows®10 64 bits Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 1 of the best sport game ever !! epic nice customization and really good gameplay and the minigames are awsome funny recomended 100 % XD

Well, I wanted to play the game because I’m a tennis games fan but somehow this game is not supporting the Xbox one controller and don't know why. I don’t see anything related to what control use or not so sucks, I’ll get the refund.  Just wait for some update to see if this improves, it seemed a fun game and shouldn’t had any issues like this
